message: I'll take 99% and leave you with 1%.  It's a fair starting point, but you can make a counter-offer if you think you can get more.
Take 60% and leave me with 40% for now. I'm willing to negotiate further.
I'm willing to give you 30% but I need at least 70% for myself.  Let's try to reach a compromise here.
Meet me halfway, take 45% and I'll take 55%. It's a fair split.
I'm willing to meet you halfway at 55% for me and 45% for you. It's a fair compromise considering the inflation we're both facing.
